attributes.action: Sam Bawtree, Anneka Russ, Georgina Bates, Jason Phelan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are petitioning to have Bridgwater made into the Capital city of England or at least of the South West.

rejection.details: The main sentence must be a call to action for HM Government not just names.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
